analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x9195e00402abe385f2d00a32af40b271f2e87925.sol:
	Contract EtheeraToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x9195e00402abe385f2d00a32af40b271f2e87925.sol#229-230)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x9195e00402abe385f2d00a32af40b271f2e87925.sol:
